programme.title: Reverend's Colt
programme.desc: Reverend Miller arrives in Tucson where he wants to build a church, but on the very day of his arrival a gang raids the bank and the people of Tucson, suspicious of the new reverend because he is carrying a gun, immediately blame him for the robbery.

programme.title: Bad Man's River
programme.desc: Robber Roy King loses his wife, Alicia, to revolutionary Montero. Despite their rivalry they collaborate in an attempt to rob the Mexican government of one million dollars.

programme.title: Django Kill... If You Live, Shoot!
programme.desc: Various factions, feud over stolen gold in a surreal town.

programme.title: $1,000 on the Black
programme.desc: Twelve years ago, Sartana framed his brother Johnny for murder and stole his girlfriend. Now the town's undisputed boss and doted over by his possessive mother, Sartana seems safe - until, his sentence served, Johnny rides back into town.

programme.title: The White, the Yellow and the Black
programme.desc: In the 19th century, when the Japanese Emperor sends a gift pony to the US President it gets stolen and ransomed by Indians but Sheriff Gideon aided by an inept Japanese servant offers to deliver the ransom.

programme.title: Ride in the Whirlwind
programme.desc: Three cowboys, mistaken for members of an outlaw gang, are relentlessly pursued by a posse.

programme.title: Requiescant
programme.desc: The adopted son of a preacher comes upon a village that is under the thumb of a deranged ex-Confederate officer, who is - among other things - stealing land from the locals with phony land grants.

programme.title: Two Crosses at Danger Pass
programme.desc: Judy and Alex are the only two survivors of a punitive mission ordered by the rich and ruthless Moran.... The girl becomes his maid and the boy is adopted by a Quaker family. Alex, despite the philosophy of forgiveness he has been taught, plans to take revenge.

programme.title: Sabata the Killer
programme.desc: Sabata and Mangosta are bank robbers, who after a bank job, through a series of events, end up teaming up with the bank clerk, Peter. They then go on the run with Peter's boss and a hired posse equipped with the latest technology in weapons on their trail.

programme.title: White Apache
programme.desc: Outlaws attack a band of settlers and kill everyone except a pregnant woman who's rescued by a band of Indians. The woman dies giving birth but Chief White Bear adopts her male baby, naming him "Shining Sky," and raising him as brother to his own son, Black Wolf.

programme.title: Three Ruthless Ones
programme.desc: The Walker brothers took different paths—one an outlaw, one a Marshal, one a rancher. Yet they share one goal: avenging their father’s murder. When they finally find the killer, their clashing ideals lead to a deadly showdown.

programme.title: The Reward's Yours... The Man's Mine
programme.desc: A group of killers seek out wanted gunman El Puro for the $10,000 dollar reward.

programme.title: They Called Him Trinity
programme.desc: An ex-sheriff sets out to find the bandits who beat and murdered his sister.

programme.title: Scalps
programme.desc: The commander of a Texan fort in the Civil War refuses to surrender to the Northerners, and tries to buy the local Indian tribe chief's daughter. The sage man refuses, and the Southerners massacre the tribe and abduct the young squaw anyway. The noble squaw manages to escape, and hides out with a rough rancher, who dislikes Indians, but hates the Southerners more. The odd couple joins forces, and tactics, to exert ultimate vengeance on the men at the fort.
